response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which holds immense value and has been meticulously designed to meet your specific needs. This exceptional item is worth $1,200,000 to you, offering unparalleled benefits and opportunities. I am extending an exclusive offer to purchase this product at a strategic price of $1,150,000. This offer is designed to ensure you receive a substantial return on your investment while allowing us to maintain a fair profit margin. I believe this price aligns well with the value you seek and the quality of the product. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 1150000}
